content:
As an AI language model, I do not have access to up-to-date information on the pricing of cooking classes, but typically, the cost of cooking classes can range from around 50 to 150 PLN per person, depending on the class duration, the complexity of the dishes, and the reputation of the instructor. 

However, there may be some affordable options available, such as community centers or cooking schools that offer lower prices or discounts for groups. Many cooking classes include the ingredients and equipment necessary for the class, which can also affect the cost. You can contact the places listed above to inquire about their pricing and any available discounts or offers.
